mapper.select: SELECT D1.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , D1.BTD_AMT /* 기초금액 */ , D1.SELL_AMT /* 발생금액 */ , D1.RVE_AMT /* 당월입금액 */ , D1.ACU_RVE_AMT /* 누적입금액 */ , D1.RES_AMT /* 잔액 */ , NVL(D1.MLG_RV_AMT, 0) AS MLG_RV_AMT /* 통합적립액 */ , NVL(D1.MLG_CAN_AMT, 0) AS MLG_CAN_AMT /* 통합적립취소액 */ FROM (SELECT C1.BASE_YM , NVL(LAG(C1.ACU_SELL_AMT - C1.ACU_RVE_AMT - NVL(C3.MLG_CAN_AMT, 0)) OVER(ORDER BY C1.BASE_YM), 0) AS BTD_AMT , C1.SELL_AMT , C1.RVE_AMT , C1.ACU_RVE_AMT , C1.ACU_SELL_AMT - C1.ACU_RVE_AMT - NVL(C3.MLG_CAN_AMT, 0) AS RES_AMT , C2.MLG_RV_AMT , C3.MLG_CAN_AMT FROM (SELECT B1.BASE_YM , SUM(B1.SELL_AMT) AS SELL_AMT , SUM(B1.RVE_AMT) AS RVE_AMT , SUM(SUM(B1.SELL_AMT)) OVER(ORDER BY B1.BASE_YM) AS ACU_SELL_AMT , SUM(SUM(B1.RVE_AMT)) OVER(ORDER BY B1.BASE_YM) AS ACU_RVE_AMT FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(A1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 1, 6) AS BASE_YM , A1.SELL_AMT , 0 AS RVE_AMT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A1 /* 계약상세 */ WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.BASE_PD_CD = 'WP07110882' /* 상수-K머니(54만) 일시불 */ AND A1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT <= #{baseYr} || '1231' /* 필수변수-기준년 */ UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(A2.PERF_DT, 1, 6) AS PERF_YM , 0 AS SELL_AMT , CASE WHEN A2.DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN A2.RVE_AMT ELSE -1 * A2.RVE_AMT END AS RVE_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL A2 /* 수납상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A3 ON A3.CNTR_NO = A2.CNTR_NO AND A3.CNTR_SN = A2.CNTR_SN AND A3.BASE_PD_CD = 'WP07110882' /* 상수-K머니(54만) 일시불 */ AND A3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A2.PERF_DT <= #{baseYr} || '1231' /* 필수변수-기준년 */ ) B1 GROUP BY B1.BASE_YM ) C1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SUBSTR(B2.MLG_RV_DT, 1, 6) AS BASE_YM , SUM(B2.MLG_RV_AMT) AS MLG_RV_AMT FROM TB_GBMI_ITG_MLG_BAS B2 /* 통합마일리지기본 */ WHERE B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.MLG_TP_CD = '0802' /* 상수-K머니 */ AND B2.MLG_ALNC_DV_CD = '01' /* 상수-에듀-웰스제휴 */ GROUP BY SUBSTR(B2.MLG_RV_DT, 1, 6) ) C2 ON C2.BASE_YM = C1.BASE_YM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SUBSTR(B2.MLG_STAT_APY_DT, 1, 6) AS BASE_YM , SUM(B2.MLG_EXTN_AMT + B2.MLG_CAN_AMT) AS MLG_CAN_AMT FROM TB_GBMI_ITG_MLG_BAS B2 /* 통합마일리지기본 */ WHERE B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.MLG_TP_CD = '0802' /* 상수-K머니 */ AND B2.MLG_ALNC_DV_CD = '01' /* 상수-에듀-웰스제휴 */ GROUP BY SUBSTR(B2.MLG_STAT_APY_DT, 1, 6) ) C3 ON C3.BASE_YM = C1.BASE_YM ) D1 WHERE D1.BASE_YM LIKE #{baseYr} || '%' /* 필수변수-기준년 */ ORDER BY D1.BASE_YM DESC

SELECT B1.CNTR_NO || '-' || B1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , B3.CST_KNM AS CNTR_CST_NM /* 고객명 */ , SUBSTR(B2.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM, 1, 6) AS RCP_YM /* 접수년월 */ , SUBSTR(B1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT, 1, 6) AS IST_YM /* 설치년월 */ , NVL(B1.SELL_AMT, 0) AS SELL_AMT /* 판매금 */ , NVL(B4.RVE_AMT, 0) AS RVE_AMT /* 당월입금액 */ , NVL(B4.ACU_RVE_AMT, 0) AS ACU_RVE_AMT /* 누적입금액 */ , NVL(B1.SELL_AMT, 0) - NVL(B4.ACU_RVE_AMT, 0) AS RES_AMT /* 잔액 */ , NVL(B4.ACU_DFA_AMT, 0) AS ACU_DFA_AMT /* 누적대손입금액 */ , SUBSTR(B4.DFA_YM, 1, 6) AS DFA_YM /* 대손년월 */ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL B1 /* 계약상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS B2 /* 계약기본 */ ON B2.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS B3 /* 고객기본 */ ON B3.CST_NO = B2.CNTR_CST_NO INNER JOIN /* 당월인 경우 LEFT OUTER JOIN */ (SELECT A1.CNTR_NO , A1.CNTR_SN , MAX(SUBSTR(A1.PERF_DT, 1, 6)) AS PERF_YM , SUM(CASE WHEN A1.DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN A1.RVE_AMT ELSE -1 * A1.RVE_AMT END) AS ACU_RVE_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN A1.RVE_DV_CD = '09' THEN CASE WHEN A1.DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN A1.RVE_AMT ELSE -1 * A1.RVE_AMT END END) AS ACU_DFA_AMT , MAX(CASE WHEN A1.RVE_DV_CD = '09' THEN SUBSTR(A1.RVE_DT, 1, 6) END) AS DFA_YM , SUM(CASE WHEN A1.PERF_DT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%' /* 필수변수-기준년월 */ THEN CASE WHEN A1.DP_DV_CD = '1' THEN A1.RVE_AMT ELSE -1 * A1.RVE_AMT END END) AS RVE_AMT FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL A1 /* 수납상세 */ WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.PERF_DT <= #{baseYm} || '31' /* 필수변수-기준년월 */ GROUP BY A1.CNTR_NO , A1.CNTR_SN ) B4 ON B4.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND B4.CNTR_SN = B1.CNTR_SN WHERE B1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B1.BASE_PD_CD = 'WP07110882' /* 상수-K머니(54만) 일시불 */ AND B1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ X1 /* WELLS매출월마감내역 */ WHERE X1.CNTR_NO = B1.CNTR_NO AND X1.CNTR_SN = B1.CNTR_SN AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')

SELECT A1.MLG_STAT_APY_DT AS RV_CAN_DT /* 적립취소일자 */ , A1.CNTR_NO || '-' || A1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /* 계약상세번호 */ , A1.MLG_EXTN_AMT + A1.MLG_CAN_AMT AS CAN_AMT /* 취소금액 */ , CASE WHEN A2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303') THEN A2.CNTR_PD_ENDDT END AS LEDG_CAN_DT /* 원장취소일자 */ FROM TB_GBMI_ITG_MLG_BAS A1 /* 통합마일리지기본 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL A2 /* 계약상세 */ ON A2.CNTR_NO = A1.CNTR_NO AND A2.CNTR_SN = A1.CNTR_SN WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.MLG_TP_CD = '0802' /* 상수-K머니 */ AND A1.MLG_ALNC_DV_CD = '01' /* 상수-에듀-웰스제휴 */ AND A1.MLG_STAT_CD IN ('CNCL', 'EXTN') /* 상수-적립취소,소멸완료 */ AND A1.MLG_STAT_APY_DT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%' /* 필수변수-기준년월 */ ORDER BY A1.MLG_STAT_APY_DT , A2.CNTR_NO , A2.CNTR_SN
